newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trading in Sing Tao shares suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trading in Sing Tao shares suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of Sing Tao Holdings Ltd was suspended at the company's request pending an announcement, the Hong Kong stock exchange said on Wednesday.
Shares of the newspaper publisher and printer edged down HK$0.025 to end at HK$2.975 on Tuesday. Volume was 416,200 shares worth 1.24 million.
